description: This file contains functions related to reasoning with Ollama models, including model identification and message-based reasoning functions with support for asynchronous operation.

methods.name: is_ollama_reasoning_model
methods.description: Checks if a given reasoning model is an Ollama model based on its class name and ID.

methods.name: get_ollama_reasoning
methods.description: Performs reasoning with an Ollama agent synchronously, extracting reasoning content from the response.

methods.name: aget_ollama_reasoning
methods.description: Performs reasoning with an Ollama agent asynchronously, extracting reasoning content from the response.
